text:
Thank you to healthcare workers & everyone on the frontline in this fight against #COVID19. You are heroes! We want to show our support by joining @glblctzn & @WHO for One World: #TogetherAtHome —a one-night special music event!

#SuperM #GlobalCitizen #coronavirus #HealthForAll https://t.co/O5svuF4Olc

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

entity.name: One World: Together at Home
entity.description: Global Citizen presents One World: Together at Home, a global special curated in collaboration with Lady Gaga and featuring your favorite artists and comedians — all in support of the World Health Organization (WHO) and the health care workers on the frontlines of the COVID-19 crisis⁠.

domain.name: Musician
domain.description: A musician in the world, like Adele or Bob Dylan

domain.name: Music Genre
domain.description: A category for a musical style, like Pop, Rock, or Rap

domain.name: Concert
domain.description: Music fesitvals and concerts, like Lollapalooza or a Marian Hill Concert
